ong%253Esuccessfully%2520has%2520defended%2520its%2520clients%2520against%2520precisely%2520this%2520new%2520kind%2520of%2520opportunistic%2520litigation%253Cstrong%253E.%2526nbsp%253B%2520%253C%252Fstrong%253EOur%2520attorneys%2520are%2520seasoned%252C%2520aggressive%2520litigation%2520strategists.%2526nbsp%253B%2520We%2520know%2520the%2520intricacies%2520and%2520nuances%2520of%2520the%2520relevant%2520laws%2520and%2520their%2520applicability%2520to%2520class%2520action%2520lawsuits.%2526nbsp%253B%2520Because%2520we%2520regularly%2520appear%2520in%2520federal%2520court%252C%2520we%2520are%2520well-acquainted%2520with%2520the%2520judges%2520and%2520with%2520many%2520of%2520the%2520lawyers%2520who%2520bring%2520these%2520kinds%2520of%2520cases.%2526nbsp%253B%2520We%2520can%2520evaluate%2520the%2520strengths%2520and%2520weaknesses%2520of%2520the%2520case%2520against%2520your%2520company%2520to%2520achieve%2520the%2520best%2520possible%2520outcome.%2526nbsp%253B%2520And%2520we%2520also%2520can%2520steer%2520you%2520towards%2520compliance%2520so%2520that%2520these%2520sorts%2520of%2520lawsuits%2520do%2520not%2520trouble%2520your%2520company%2520again.%253C%252Fp%253E%250A%253Cp%253EDO%2520NOT%2520despair%2520if%2520your%2520company%2520has%2520been%2520targeted%2520by%2520one%2520of%2520these%2520serial%2520plaintiffs%253B%2520many%2520companies%2520have%2520faced%2520the%2520same%2520predicament.%2526nbsp%253B%2520Turn%2520to%2520us%2520for%2520help%2520and%2520guidance.%2526nbsp%253B%2520We%2520have%2520the%2520experience%2520that%2520your%2520company%2520needs%2520now.%253C%252Fp%253E%250A%253Cdiv%2520class%253D%2522sharedaddy%2520sd-sharing-enabled%2522%253E%253Cdiv%2520class%253D%2522robots-nocontent%2520sd-block%2520sd-social%2520sd-social-icon%2520sd-sharing%2522%253E%253Ch3%2520class%253D%2522sd-title%2520fusion-responsive-typography-calculated%2522%2520data-fontsize%253D%252212%2522%2520data-lineheight%253D%252214.4px%2522%2520style%253D%2522--fontSize%253A12%2 acts.what: 4 packages and 16 custom tests, with duplication discounts

rules.aatt: multiply warning by 2, error by 4; sum; subtract discounts
rules.axe: multiply minor by 2, moderate by 3, serious by 4, critical by 5; sum; subtract discounts
rules.bulk: subtract 250 from visible elements; make 0 if negative; raise to 0.9th power; multiply by 0.15
rules.embAc: multiply link- or button-contained links, buttons, inputs, and selects by 3 (discounted)
rules.focAll: multiply discrepancy between focusable and focused element counts by 3
rules.focOp: multiply nonfocusable operable elements by 4, nonoperable focusable by 1; sum
rules.hover: multiply elements changing page on hover by 4, made visible by 2, with directly changed opacity by 0.1, with indirectly changed opacity by 0.2, unhoverable by 2; sum
rules.ibm: multiply violations by 4, recommendatons by 2; sum; subtract discounts
rules.labClash: multiply conflictually labeled elements by 2, unlabeled elements by 2; sum
rules.log: multiply log items by respective logWeights; sum
rules.menuNav: multiply Home and End errors by 1 and other key-navigation errors by 3; sum
rules.motion: get PNG screenshot sizes (sss); get differing-pixel counts between adjacent PNG screenshots (pd); “sssd” = sss difference ÷ smaller sss - 1; multiply mean adjacent sssd by 5, maximum adjacent sssd by 2, maximum over-all ssd by 1; divide mean pd by 10,000, maximum pd by 25,000; multiply count of non-0 pd by 30; sum
rules.radioSet: multiply radio buttons not in fieldsets with legends and no other-name radio buttons by 2
rules.role: multiple role attributes with invalid or native-HTML-equivalent values by 2
rules.styleDiff: for each of element classes block a, inline a, button, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, and h6, get diffStyles-distinct styles; multiply their count minus 1 by 2; multiply count of elements with non-plurality styles by 0.2; sum
rules.tabNav: multiply Home and End errors by 1 and other key-navigation errors by 3; sum
rules.wave: multiply alerts by 2, contrast errors by 3, errors by 4; sum; subtract discounts
